short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fun extension that replaces political names on social media with nicknames made by certain politicians.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:

Dynamic Text Transformations: Experience tweets in technicolor as phrases morph into iconic quips from Joe Biden and Donald Trump. It's red versus blue in a digital duel where only the wittiest words win.
Customize Your Palette: You control the artistic direction of your feed. Activate Biden, Trump, or both to paint your political landscape as you see fit. Switch settings with a simple click—no executive order needed.
Always Campaign-Ready: Refresh your feed with every scroll, ensuring you're always on the pulse of the politi-sphere. Perfect for debate nights, tweetstorms, or just a regular scroll through your timeline.
Elegantly Understated: Like a well-managed campaign, this extension operates discreetly in the background, enhancing your Twitter experience without overwhelming it.
Commitment to Privacy: No tracking, no data collection, just pure entertainment. Your privacy remains intact, as confidential as a closed-door hearing.
User Guide:

Quick Installation: Add "Politicians Paint the Web" to Chrome with a single click and start transforming your Twitter experience instantly.
Easy Configuration: Click the extension icon anytime to toggle between Biden blue and Trump red, adapting your feed to fit the political mood of the moment.
Enjoy a Vivid Twitter Feed: Dive into a more vibrant Twitter world where every tweet is a potential masterpiece of political expression.
Why You Need Politicians Paint the Web:
This extension is ideal for those who love to engage with politics humorously and lightheartedly. It’s perfect for political enthusiasts, social media savants, and anyone who likes their daily dose of tweets served with a side of satirical flair.

Looking Ahead:
We're just getting started! Future updates will bring more politicians into the mix, broadening the spectrum of political color and commentary available at your fingertips.

Feedback and Support:
Your input is invaluable as we strive to make "Politicians Paint the Web" even better. Connect with us through our support link to share your feedback or suggest new features.
